objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Drama lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about daily routines and habits using informal register
Students create original drama themed content about daily routines and habits in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Drama story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using informal register in drama context
Character B: Responding in informal register within drama theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with conflict
daily routines and habits with tension
daily routines and habits with struggle

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
